# MATLAB Editor backup files
*.asv
*.bak
*~

# MATLAB autosave files
*.autosave

# MATLAB temporary files
*.tmp
*.log

# MATLAB figure files (si no quer√©s versionar figuras)
*.fig

# MATLAB compiled files
*.mex*
*.p
*.mlx

# MATLAB Simulink generated files
slprj/
simulink_cache/
model_slx.slx~
model.mdl~
*.slxc

# MATLAB project and session files
*.prj
*.mlproj
*.mlappinstall

# Operating system files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Editor swap files (general)
*.swp
*.swo
